DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to compare the safety and efficacy of two doses of dexmethylphenidate to two doses of an approved, long-acting, marketed medication for ADHD (MPH) and placebo in children ages 6-12 diagnosed with ADHD.
DOC.brief_title: Safety and Efficacy Study of Dexmethylphenidate in Children With ADHD
DOC.criteria: DSMIV diagnosis of ADHD Males and females aged 612 Inability of understand or follow instructions Is pregnant Diagnosis of tic disorder History of seizure disorder
